amendment.description: To require a report on an expanded partnership between the Department of Defense and the Department of Veterans Affairs for the provision of health care services.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2557 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2557 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Graham. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12787) To require a report on an expanded partnership between the Department of Defense and the Department of Veterans Affairs for the provision of health care services.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2557 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2557 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Graham.
